duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for selling products to end-user customers and generating sales for assigned named accounts or territories.
Represents the company to the customer and the customer to the company in sales activities.
Identifies and recruits strategic partners to embed and/or resell company products.
Promotes and sells products and/or solutions to current or new customers/partners.
Creates, monitors, and revises lead generation plans.
Develops and maintains positive ongoing long-term relationships with key customers.
May drive customer utilization of online sales.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s or Master’s Degree or equivalent. Post-graduate, certification, and/or license may be required.
